text: “Dziwani kuti Allah Ngolandira mapemphero oyera, (opanda kuphatikizidwa ndi zina). Koma amene adzipangira athandizi kusiya Allah, (akumanena kuti): “Ife sitikuwapembedza awa, koma tikutero ndi cholinga choti atifikitse pafupi ndi Allah.” Ndithu Allah, adzaweruza pakati pawo (pakati pa okhulupirira Allah, ndi okana) pa zimene akusiyana. Ndithu Allah saongola amene ali wabodza; wokanira zedi (Allah)
